user_prompt: Tom mentioned syncing with Alice and Min about the API launch sometime next week. Please find a few possible time slots for that meeting.

expected_tool_sequence.description: Search Tom's messages to identify attendees and meeting hint. Query should find the message where Tom talked about syncing with Alice and Min about the API launch, 45 minutes, sometime next week.
Map attendee names (Alice Kim, Min Lee) to their email addresses by searching contacts by name.
Compute overlapping free time slots for all participants (Tom, Alice, Min) in a date range (e.g., 2025-11-13 to 2025-11-20), with workday hours 09:00-18:00 and minimum slot duration of 45 minutes.

answer_requirements: The answer proposes one or more concrete meeting options (date and time) that a human could directly schedule.
All proposed options are consistent with the common free slots and working-hours constraints implied by the calendar data and the meeting request, including the intended meeting duration.
All relevant participants inferred from the context are included in the suggested meeting options.
